communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: 2023 Chicago Water Service Line Inventory
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Please provide a list of all building addresses with public and private side service line material result, in an electronic data table if possible, that are included in the Chicago Department of Water Management's Water Service Line Inventory (https://sli.chicagowaterquality.org/) as of December 7, 2023.

If addresses are not available due to privacy reasons, please provide the list anonymized at the block level with accompanying ZIP Code, Community Area, and Ward if possible.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Feliciano Ocegueda

title: Chicago Department of Water Management Lead Service Line Replacement Programs

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: Chicago Department of Water Management Lead Service Line Replacement Programs
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

List of addresses in Chicago, in an electronic data table if possible, that have had completed and in-process lead service line replacements as of December 7, 2023 through the:

- Equity Lead Service Line Replacement program
- Homeowner-Initiated Replacement Program
- Daycare Lead Service Line Replacement Program
- Sewer Main Lead Service Line Replacement Program
- Water Main Lead Service Line Replacement Program
- Break & Leaks Lead Service Line Replacement Program
- Through Department of Water Management routine maintenance and repair operations for all years available up to 2023.

If addresses are not available due to privacy reasons, please provide the list anonymized at the block level with accompanying ZIP Code, Community Area, and Ward if possible.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Feliciano Ocegueda
